__e: Peg, I'm not touching this, and I mean that in every sense of the word.
Anyway, Peg, don't worry about it because it's turned out to be the greatest thing that happened to us.
Peg, don't you see, the envelope was a pretty red one because the bank is a little mad at us because we haven't paid in months.
I'll tell Peg and Al tonight that--
Hey, Al, don't you wanna call home, make sure Peg and the kids are okay?
Her name's Peg, and nobody's meeting anyone.
